content:
Let's add those coffee expenses to your total.

**Grocery Total: $75**

**Coffee/Non-Grocery Total: $15 + $12.99 = $27.99**

**Total Expenses: $75 + $27.99 = $102.99**

I'll keep these expenses separate, so we can track your grocery expenses and non-grocery expenses (like coffee and snacks) separately.

Feel free to add any other expenses you've had this month!
